price: Mereka bergirang hati dengan nikmat dan karunia yang yang besar dari Allah, dan bahwa Allah tidak menyia-nyiakan pahala orang-orang yang beriman.
arabic: ۞ يَسۡتَبۡشِرُونَ بِنِعۡمَةٖ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَفَضۡلٖ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُضِيعُ أَجۡرَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yastabshirūna biniʿ'matin mina al-lahi wafaḍlin wa-anna al-laha lā yuḍīʿu ajra al-mu'minīna
